name: MERN Stack Application with Admin Panel
desc: The project implements user registration, login, and logout functionalities using bcryptjs for password hashing, jsonwebtoken for token-based authentication, and mongoose for user data storage. Utilized Sanity IO (Headless CMS) for storing and managing blog posts. React-based frontend with routing, styling, and interactive elements. User experience enhanced with toasts and visual feedback.

name: Android Application for Managing Academics
desc: Designed a backend database to store and manage a comprehensive collection of more than 1000+ CAT's and FAT's exam papers. Incorporated secure authentication and authorization mechanisms using Firebase Authentication. Effectively managed dependencies using Gradle, incorporating various libraries to enhance app functionality and user experience.

name: Smart Object Detection System
desc: Engineered OpenCV's deep learning-based object detection algorithms to optimize performance on the ESP32 CAM's embedded hardware. Integrated image processing pipelines to enable seamless real-time analysis of video streams from ESP32 CAM's built-in camera. Developed a real-time video processing pipeline using OpenCV's VideoCapture API.

name: Dynamic Exam Paper Distribution System
desc: Developed a web application and Android system for dynamic exam paper distribution. Features include: uploading question papers to AWS S3, automated thumbnail creation, real-time data synchronization with Firebase (using JSON), and instant availability of papers on the Last One Android app.

name: Optimized Train Seat Allocation System
desc: Developed a MERN stack train seat management system that enables users to easily book seats with intelligent allocation logic. Features include real-time seat availability, prioritized in-row booking, a seven-seat booking limit, and a user-friendly interface built with React. MongoDB efficiently stores and manages seat data.

name: Kanban Board
desc: A React.js-based Kanban Board designed to help teams manage tasks efficiently by organizing them based on status, user, or priority. Itâ€™s visually inspired by the Kanban methodology, offering an intuitive way to track and prioritize tasks.

name: Data Processing API and Frontend: Full Stack Project
desc: Created a full-stack application with a REST API for processing and filtering data, and a user-friendly frontend for data visualization. Project completed for a developer assessment (Qualifier Round).

name: A Simple Version of a TODO APP
desc: It is a todo app built on MERN Stack, performs simple CURD Operation.
